name: Simple Story - Alex
description: It's a short interactive story, about Alex, an ordinary loser. He lives a dull life, full of alcohol and misery, but deep in his soul, he always wanted to be a hero. One day, then he leaves his house, Alex accidentally teleported in mystery temple. Temple, the exit from which you should find!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
